SEARCH

Class PartTimeEmployee

java.lang.Object
Employee
PartTimeEmployee
public class PartTimeEmployee extends Employee
Part-time employees must submit a pay claim form by the second Friday of a month in order to be paid that month. The payroll system should generate pay slips for all full-time staff and hourly paid staff (with current claims) on the 25th day of each month.

  • Constructor Details

    • PartTimeEmployee

      public PartTimeEmployee(String name, String jobCategory, String jobTitle, int scalePoint, double hourlyRate) throws FileNotFoundException
      Constructor taking parameters from parent class (Employee) and adding hourly rate.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the employee.
      jobCategory - The job category of the employee.
      jobTitle - The job title of the employee.
      scalePoint - The current scale point of the employee.
      hourlyRate - The hourly rate of the employee.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - If the file with pay scale is not found/invalid

    • payClaim

      public void payClaim()
      Claim form method. This resets the hours worked and displays the gross pay.
